description: Noise-cancelling over-ear headphones with 20 hours battery life.
Feature-rich fitness tracker with heart rate and sleep monitoring.
1.7-liter electric kettle with auto shut-off and boil-dry protection.
100% organic green tea leaves sourced from Darjeeling.
Ergonomic wired gaming mouse with adjustable DPI and RGB lighting.
Eco-friendly, non-slip yoga mat available in multiple colors.
Insulated water bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours.
Compact power bank with fast charging and dual USB ports.
Waterproof portable speaker with deep bass and 10 hours playtime.
Adjustable brightness and color temperature with touch control.
Lightweight, breathable running shoes with cushioned sole.
Fast wireless charging stand compatible with all Qi-enabled devices.
